findings.title: Possible boolean-based SQL injection
findings.remediation: Use parameterized queries/prepared statements; validate input; avoid string concatenation; consider ORM/WAF.

findings.title: Missing security header: Content-Security-Policy
findings.evidence: Content-Security-Policy not present in HTTP response headers.
findings.remediation: Add a CSP, e.g. "default-src 'self'; script-src 'self'"; avoid 'unsafe-inline'.

findings.title: Missing security header: Referrer-Policy
findings.evidence: Referrer-Policy not present in HTTP response headers.

findings.title: Missing security header: X-Content-Type-Options
findings.evidence: X-Content-Type-Options not present in HTTP response headers.

findings.title: Missing security header: X-Frame-Options
findings.evidence: X-Frame-Options not present in HTTP response headers.

findings.title: Open port: 135
findings.remediation: Close unused ports or restrict access with a firewall.

findings.title: Open port: 445
findings.remediation: Close unused ports or restrict access with a firewall.

findings.title: TLS observation
findings.remediation: Review TLS configuration for modern best practices.

findings.title: TLS observation
findings.remediation: Review TLS configuration for modern best practices.
